Author: bumbumboleji
Text: Yeah, parents throwing out my excercise tape because they heard that excercise was bad for people with EDs (that was the one thing that allowed me to be okay with eating) really worked well /s  Then I was fucked up AND had no one to trust. And had my one healthy outlet removed! Great times.

Author: x24throwaway
Text: Omg when I was 14, my parents wanted to try being like this with me. My therapist told them it was a bad idea for me thankfully. They had read/heard that taking away choices and controlling every aspect was supposedly helpful in recovery for young people. I was mortified.
